definition: (of a sore etc) to fester/to ulcerate

sentences.english: In this patient, the septic emboli are arising from a thrombophlebitis of the internal jugular vein.

sentences.english: She applied some ointment to ripen the abscesses on the gums.

sentences.english: If there is blood or pus in the stool, I recommend you consult with a physician.

sentences.english: The doctor lanced the boil to let the pus out.
